venue.address_2: Mammoth Rd. & S. Willow also called Rt.28A Manchester
venue.name: The Yard Seafood & Steak House

item.description: The Groove Alliance will be performing at The Yard in the Midnight Rodeo Bar this Friday, January 27th, at 9:00. If you like, come early and have something to eat or just sit and talk. We will be meeting for conversation and dinner at 7:30 and will have signs on the table. This is a new location for me so I am not sure where we will be located but please look for the signs!! If you haven't heard the band you can check them out at their web site at http://www.groove-alliance.com/index.html Look forward to seeing you there!!
item.name: Groove Alliance at The Yard
